Development

    The Wonders

    Wonders are exclusive structures within Eternum, with only 50 out of the 8,000 realms designated a Wonders.

    Exclusive Benefits

    ğŸ« Cheaper Donkeys

    • Wonders produce donkeys at 10% the Lords cost of a regular Realm at the same speed.

    ğŸ”® 3x Starting Resources

    • Wonders start with three times the resources of a regular Realm, making them incredibly valuable at the very start of the Eternum journey.
